title: The architect of Obamakari Jonathan Gruber salutes American misery.
subtitle: "The architect of Obamakari" Jonathan Gruber recently said that Obama Carrie had passed only because of the "greatness" of the American voter and the lack of "transparency" and deleted the video footage from his remarks.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The architect Obama Carrie said that Obama Carrie had passed only because of the "neglect" of American voters and the lack of "transparency," and video footage of his remarks had been deleted from the Internet in an attempt to hide it.
